snippet: Wisconsin will be coached in the Rose Bowl by Barry Alvarez, its former coach-turned athletic director, after Bret Bielema left for Arkansas this week.
abstract: Barry Alvarez, Wisconsin athletic director and former head football coach, says he will coach the team in Rose Bowl, replacing Bret Bielema who accepted job at Arkansas.
lead_paragraph: Wisconsin will be coached in the Rose Bowl by Barry Alvarez, its former coach-turned athletic director, after Bret Bielema left for Arkansas this week.

headline.main: Alvarez to Coach Wisconsin in Rose Bowl
headline.print_headline: Alvarez to Coach Wisconsin in Rose Bowl
